#This program will replace and reverse a given string 

def replace_reverse(string): 
    #replace all "a" with "b"
    new_string = string.replace("a", "b") 
    #reverse the new string
    reversed_string = new_string[::-1] 
    #return the reversed string
    return reversed_string

#test the function
print(replace_reverse("abacadabra"))
